00019 double etime() //
00020 {
00021         static double last_clock = 0;
00022         static double now_time = 0;
00023         last_clock = now_time;
00024         now_time = (double) clock();
00025         return (double) (now_time - last_clock) / (double)CLOCKS_PER_SEC;
00026 }
